page.title: 06CHILDREN'S GAMES-BIRMINGHAM
page.content: ANY NUMBER OF PEOPLE CAN PLAY DANCING DOLLIES.TO START YOU NEED TO CHOOSE ONE PERSON WHO IS GIVEN A TENNIS BALL.THEY SHOULD START ABOUT 5 METRES AWAY FROM THE WALL.EVERYONE ELSE IN THE GAME MUST STAND AGAINST THE WALL. THE PEOPLE AGAINST THE WALL HAVE TO START MOVING ABOUT WHILST THE PERSON WITH THE BALL TRIES TO HIT THEM WITH IT.IF YOU ARE HIT YOU ARE OUT OF THE GAME.THE LAST PERSON TO BE HIT WITH THE BALL IS THE NEXT ONE TO BE ON. WE CALL THIS DANCING DOLLIES BECAUSE EVERYONE PLAYING LOOKS AS IF THEY ARE DANCING WHEN THEY HAVE TO DODGE THE BALL. OTHER POPULAR GAMES ARE BRITISH BULLDOGS,FOOTBALL,ROUNDERS,SKIPPING,CRI KET,AND TAG C
